title: Washington lawmakers take education reform ideas on the road
text:
05 Washington lawmakers take education reform ideas on the road 
San Francisco Chronicle: SEATTLE (AP) â€” Washington state senators from both political parties are taking education spending ideas on the road to get citizen input. But they plan to mostly avoid the biggest issue in the debate: Where will the money come from?
